text: It would be really helpful if you donated to Save the Children fund!
What does the money go towards if I donate?

When crisis strikes and children are most vulnerable, we are always among the first to respond and the last to leave. We ensure children's unique needs are met and their voices are heard. We deliver lasting results for millions of children, including those hardest to reach. We do whatever it takes for children Â¡Âª transforming their lives and the future we share Â¡Âª because we believe every child deserves a future.
Where in the world are the children located?
US and global, wherever children need help, they are there.
If I donate $25, does that go a long way?
Absolutely, a small amount of money for us turns out to be life changing for those in need. A dollar can buy a lot!
Will it help towards education?
Yes, it is one of the core programs. It leads children out of poverty so is a large focus.
Do you accept monthly donations of smaller amounts?
You can do a one time donation or a monthly subscription.
What are the amounts for monthly subscriptions?
between 5 - 100
Do I get updates on a specific child if I donate monthly?
Yes you can sponsor a child and receive specific information about what your money is doing and how they are progressing each month.
To what age are children receiving help?
From infants to young adults all children are helped.
I would like to donate $5 monthly.
Thank you, that is wonderful and you will help a tremendous amount!
Am I able to communicate with the child?
Yes you can write them letters and they can write you back, thanks!
Great, thank you very much
